feed.title: Combined summary - BIP-119 CTV Meeting #3 Draft Agenda for Tuesday February 8th at 12:00 PT

entry.title: Combined summary - BIP-119 CTV Meeting #3 Draft Agenda for Tuesday February 8th at 12:00 PT
entry.summary: Bitcoin Developers are invited to attend a recurring meeting on February 8th at 12:00 PT in channel ##ctv-bip-review in libera.chat IRC server. The meeting is scheduled to last approximately 2 hours. The proposed topics for discussion include Bug Bounty Updates, Non-Interactive Lightning Channels, CTV's "Dramatic" Improvement of DLCs, PathCoin, OP_TXHASH, Emulating CTV for Liquid and General Discussion. The agenda provides links to relevant information that will be reviewed during the meeting. Attendees are encouraged to review the agenda in advance and send any feedback, proposed topic changes, additions or questions beforehand. No requests have been made to add content to the agenda so far. Jeremy Rubin, the organizer, will send out a reminder with a finalized agenda before the meeting.
